column2: # --- INTENT: Merge necessary baseline covariates from mig_wide into mig_long for robustness checks. ---
# --- EFFECT: Selects baseline variables and RespondentID from mig_wide, then merges them into mig_long based on RespondentID. ---
message("Merging baseline covariates into long format data for robustness checks...")
# Select baseline variables and ID from wide format
dplyr::select(RespondentID, age, educ, male, Score, bs.exp.now, bs.exp.past, mg.pln_w1)
